Wildlife Conservation Society - WCS, and Center for International Earth Science Information Network - CIESIN - Columbia University. 
2005. Last of the Wild Project, Version 2, 2005 (LWP-2): Global Human Footprint Dataset (Geographic). Palisades, NY: NASA Socioeconomic Data and Applications Center (SEDAC). https://doi.org/10.7927/H4M61H5F
